snippet: Iran’s leaders insist that the conflict in Syria, their main ally in the Arabic world, is manageable and ultimately will be resolved to their advantage.
abstract: Iran's leaders continue to perceive bloody conflict in Syria, their main ally in Arab world, as manageable and insist that it will ultimately will be resolved to Iran's advantage.
lead_paragraph: Iran’s leaders insist that the conflict in Syria, their main ally in the Arabic world, is manageable and ultimately will be resolved to their advantage.

headline.seo: Iran Has Rosy View of Unrest in Syria
headline.main: For Iran, Unrest in Syria Is Noise, Not Brutal War
headline.print_headline: For Iran, Unrest in Syria Is Noise, Not Brutal War

keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )
